root.description: OverviewTower defense game in which battles occur within the mind of a child named William. Drive enemies away to clear his mind and let him retain his sanity. Fog shrouds the playing field; in order to push away the fog, the player must deploy units to collect light. Parts of the map are animated and have a function in the game.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows 7Processor: Intel double core/quad-core 2.66Ghz or AMD 3.26GhzMemory: 4 GB RAMHard Disk Space: 1.2 GB free spaceVideo Card: 1GB and Shader Model 3.0 (ATI 4870, Nvidia GeForce 260)Additional:Quicktime 7 or later
